card.description: Survey of customers in a raspado shop on whether or not they like certain raspado combinations.

context.potentialUses: Help make recommendations for what kind of raspado a new customer should order.

fields.description: Does the raspado include pecan toppings?
Does the raspado include strawberry toppings?
Does the raspado include vanilla toppings?
Does the raspado include mango toppings?
Does the raspado include lime toppings?
Does the raspado include chile en polbo toppings?
Does the raspado include lechera toppings?
Does the raspado include coconut toppings?
Do you like or dislike the raspado?
